itunes:title: Episode 625 - Special Guest Asking Alexandria's Danny Worsnop
title: Episode 625 - Special Guest Asking Alexandria's Danny Worsnop
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back Asking Alexandria lead vocalist Danny Worsnop to discuss his first show he has booked since before the quarantine, the 3 talk about how some bands lose their edge by releasing multiple albums that sound the sa...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back Asking Alexandria lead vocalist Danny Worsnop to discuss his first show he has booked since before the quarantine, the 3 talk about how some bands lose their edge by releasing multiple albums that sound the same, Danny explains the prevalent meanings behind the songs in his newest album “Like A House On Fire”, and the 3 completely support the current movement to change the name of Columbus, Ohio to Flavortown USA.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
